K10sf68_sc:1: Hart_1 “pṛccha Bodha d eva yad yad evākāṁkṣasi.”
K10sf68_sc:2: Hart_2 “katibhir bhadaṁtāṁgaiḥ samanvāgata āryaśrāvakaḥ kṣipram evāsmiṁ dharmavinaye āsravakṣayam anuprāpnoti?”
K10sf68_sc:3: Hart_3 “tena hi Bodha tvām eva pra + + yathā te kṣamate ’thainam vyākuru! kiṁ manyase Bodha
K10sf68_sc:4: kuśalas tvaṁ pitrye śilpasthānakarmasthāne tadyathāhastigrīvāyām aśvapṛṣṭhe rathe
K10sf68_sc:5: sarau dhanuṣy apayāne niryāṇe aṁkuśagrahepāśagrahe toramaragrahe lipigaṇananyasanasaṁkhyāmudrāyāṁ?”
K10sf68_sc:6: Hart_4 “tathyam ahaṁ bhadanta kuśalaḥ pitrye śilpasthānakarmasthāne tadyathāhasti-grīvāyām
K10sf68_sc:7: aśvapṛṣṭhe rathe sarau dhanuṣy apayāne niryāṇe aṁkuśagrahetomaragrahe lipigaṇananyasanasaṁkhyāmudrāyām.”
K10sf68_sc:8: Hart_5 “atha puruṣa āgacchet tasyaivaṁ syāt: kuśalo bata Bodho rājakumāraḥ pitryeśilpasthānakarmasthāne
K10sf68_sc:9: tadyathāhastigrīvāyām aśvapṛṣṭhe rathe saraudhanuṣy apayāne niryāṇe aṁkuśagrahe pāśagrahe
K10sf68_sc:10: tomaragrahe lipigaṇananyasanasaṁkhyāmudrāyāṁ. yanv aham asyāntikād anyatamānyatamaśilpasthānakarmasthānam anvāgamayeyam iti
K10sf68_sc:11: Hart_6 sa ca syād aśrāddhaḥ; kiṁ manyase Bodha: yat tac chrāddhena prāptavyaṁprāpnuyāt saḥ?”
K10sf68_sc:13: Hart_7 “sa ca syāc chaṭhaḥ; kiṁ manyase Bodha: yat tadṛ śaṭhīna prāptavyanprāpnuyāt sa?”
K10sf68_sc:15: Hart_8 “sa ca syād bahvābādhaḥ; kiṁ manyase Bodha: yat tad alpābādhena prāptavyaṁ prāpnuyāt saḥ?”
K10sf68_sc:17: Hart_9 “sa ca syād anārabdhavīryaḥ; kiṁ manyase Bodha: yat tad ārabdhavīryeṇaprāptavyaṁ prāpnuyāt sa?”
K10sf68_sc:19: Hart_10 “sa ca syād duṣprajñaḥ; kiṁ manyase Bodha: yat tat prājñena prāptavyaṁprāpnuyāt sa?”
K10sf68_sc:20: “no bhadanta; ekaikena tāvad bhadanta ito ’ṅgena samanvāgatena tena puruṣeṇa na sukaraṁ
K10sf68_sc:21: mamāntikād anyatamānyatamaṁ śilpasthāna-karmasthānam anvāgamayituṁ; kaḥ punar vādaḥ sarvaiḥ.”
K10sf68_sc:22: Hart_11 “dvitīyo .āpuruṣa āgacchet tasyaivaṁ syāt: kuśalo bata Bodho rāja-kumāraḥ pitrye
K10sf68_sc:23: śilpasthānakarmmasthāne tadyathāhastigrīvāyāṁ aśva-pṛṣṭhe rathe sarau dhanuṣy apayāne
K10sf68_sc:25: aham asyāntikād anyata-mānyatamac chilpasthānakarmmasthānam anvāgamayeyam iti.
K10sf68_sc:26: Hart_12 sa ca syāc chrāddhaḥ; kiṁ manyase Bodha yat tac chrāddhena prāptavyaṁprāpnuyāt sa?”
K10sf68_sc:28: Hart_13 “sa ca syād aśaṭhaḥ; kiṁ manyase Bodha:  yat tad aśaṭhena prāptavyaṁprāpnuyāt sa?”
K10sf68_sc:30: Hart_14 “sa ca syād alpābādhaḥ; kim manyase Bodha: yat tad alpābādhena prāptavyaṁprāpnuyāt saḥ?”
K10sf68_sc:32: Hart_15 “sa ca syād ārabdhavīryaḥ; kiṁ manyase  Bodha: yat tad ārabdhavīryeṇaprāptavyaṁ prāpnuyāt sa?” “evaṁ bhadanta.”
K10sf68_sc:33: Hart_16 “sa ca syāt prājñaḥ; kiṁ manyase Bodha: yat tat prājñena prāptavyaṁ prāpnuyātsa?”
K10sf68_sc:34: “evaṁ bhadanta; ekaikena tāvad bhadanta ito ’ṅgena samanvāgatena tenapuruṣeṇa sukaraṁ
K10sf68_sc:35: mamāntikād anyatamānyatamac chilpasthānakarmasthānasamanvāgamayituṁ; kaḥ punar vādaḥ sarvair.”
K10sf68_sc:36: Hart_17 “evam eva Bodha paṁcabhiḥ prādhānikāṁgais samanvāgata āryaśrāvakaḥkṣipram evāsmiṁ dharmavinaye āsravakṣayam anuprāpnoti; katamaiḥ paṁcabhir?
K10sf68_sc:37: Hart_18.1 iha Bodha āryaśrāvakasya tathāgatasyāntike śraddhābhiniviṣṭābhavatimū lajātāpratiṣṭhitāasaṁhāryāśramaṇena
K10sf68_sc:38: vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā kenacid vā punar loke sahadharmatam;
K10sf68_sc:40: Hart_18.2 punar aparaṁ + Bodha āryaśrāvako ’śaṭhībhavaty amāyāvīṛjukoṛjukajātīyaḥ sa yathābhū
K10sf68_sc:41: tam ātmānam āviṣkaroti śāstur antike vijñānāṁ casabrahmacārīṇām anena dvitīyena prādhānikenāṁgena
K10sf68_sc:43: Hart_18.3 punar aparaṁ āryaśrāvaka alpābādho bhavaty arogajātīyaḥ samayāpācanyāgrahaṇyāsamanvāgato
K10sf68_sc:45: paripākaṁ gacchanti; anenatṛtīyena prādhānikāṁgena samanvāgato bhavaty ābhavaty āryaśrāvakaḥ.
K10sf68_sc:46: Hart_18.4 punar aparaṁ Bodha āryaśrāvakaḥ ārabdhavīryo viharati sthāmavāṁ vīryavānutsāhīdṛḍhaparākramo
K10sf68_sc:47: ’nikṣiptadhuraḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu: kāmaṁ tvak snāyvasthi cāvatiṣṭhatāṁ, pariśuṣyatu
K10sf68_sc:48: śarīrān māṁsaśoṇitam. atha ca punar yattad ārabdhavīryeṇa prāptavyaṁ sthāmavatā vīryavatā
K10sf68_sc:49: utsāhinā dṛḍhaparākrameṇānikṣiptadhureṇa kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu tad vata nāprāpyāntarādvīryasya
K10sf68_sc:50: sraṁsanaṁ bhaviṣyaty; anena caturthena prādhānikenāṁgena samana-vāgato bhavaty āryaśrāvakaḥ.
K10sf68_sc:51: Hart_18.5 punar aparaṁ Bodhāryaśrāvakaḥ prajñāvān viharati lokasyodayāstaṁgaminyāprajñayāsamanvāgataḥ
K10sf68_sc:53: anena paṁcamena prādhānikenāṁgena samanvāgato bhavaty āryaśrāvakaḥ.
K10sf68_sc:54: Hart_19 ebhir Bodha paṁcabhiḥ prādhānikāṁgais samanvāgataḥ āryaśrāvakaḥ kṣipramevāsmiṁ dharmavinaye āsravakṣayam anuprāpnoti.”
K10sf68_sc:55: Hart_20 atha Bodho rājakumāraḥ pū rvaṁ kāyam abhyunnamayya dakṣiṇaṁ bāhumabhiprasāryāttamanāttamanāudānam
K10sf68_sc:56: udānayati: “aho buddha aho dharma ahosaṁgha aho dharmasya svākhyātatā, yatredānīṁ
K10sf68_sc:57: paṁcabhiḥ prādhāni-kāṁgenagaiḥ samanvāgata āryaśrāvakaḥ kṣipram evāsmiṁ dharmavinayeāsravakṣayam anuprāpnotīti!”
